column4: it seems to me that after a while of the system running things start getting a bit muddled up and everything takes a bit longer than before ... till it gets to the point where I just have to reboot  .... :(

as I said ... things slow down ... like maximising an open PP presentation from it's minimized position or even pasting a line in here ... it's like the hdd has to constantly play catch up to something for several second before anything happens
yeah ... not really a solution ... FF should be only taking up what it needs
thought linux was past the whole rebooting thing :|
no special setup or anything either ...
everyone has heard of gnome being sluggish, its common knowledge
well ... now it is even more common than before :P
